Reviews.Title: “Stayed at the Deer Run on our anniversary!”
Reviews.Author: anitadowning1
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed at the Deer Run, 8/24-8/26/12 and had a great stay! We were coming into Branson to see a concert which was cancelled,but, decided to visit Branson anyway. On the way into town we requested that our rooms be changed and they were able to do that, no problem-no hassle at all. When we got there they surprised us by congratulating us on our anniversary by putting it up on their marquee. We were surprised and pleased and used this as a photo op for memories of our anniversary and our visit to Branson! They were able to give us advice on what to do at SDC, which our entire family enjoyed in spite of the much needed rain which arrived during our stay. Our daughter brought her Ipod and needed to charge it, and didn't have a way to charge it, Jodi very graciously allowed our daughter to charge her ipod and was willing to return it to our room. We really appreciated this and it was no hassle at all. The breakfast was good to have on both morning in town and then on our way out. We will definitely visit this motel again and recommend our friends and family to go there as well.

Reviews.Title: “Very good for what it is”
Reviews.Author: BobSnowedn
Reviews.Content: Deer Run is an inexpensive hotel that is just off the Silver Dollar City property. It's not big on amenities, but the rooms are clean, and the staff is very nice. They serve a complimentary breakfast. When I was there, it was biscuits and gravy, cereals, fruit, bagels, bread, and donuts along wth coffee, juice, and tea bags and hot chocolate packets. Pretty much a carb overload! There's a good sized outdoor pool onsite, and nearby is a bar and a convenience store. The only negative I'm aware of is that cell reception is bad in the 1st floor room on the side of the office as they're practically underground.

Reviews.Title: “Treats you like family - Wonderful Experience!”
Reviews.Author: Karen F
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I just stayed at this motel so that we could attend the Southern Gospel Festival at Silver Dollar City. Since we did not have reservations, staff immediately offered to show us a room before we booked. Our room was very clean and staff was very friendly. Breakfast was served in a large conference room which allowed for a pleasant experience. Plenty of available seating. Staff were constantly cleaning the tables and keeping all food items stocked. Silver Dollar City provided a shuttle from the motel to their park. It was nice not having to fight traffic and locate our parked car at the end of the day. My husband and I will definitely stay here again whenever we are in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “haines58”
Reviews.Author: haines58
Reviews.Content: We just returned from staying @ Deer Run during the Gospel Fest @ Silver Dollar City. Loved the location and that a bus comes from SDC for transport. The rooms were very clean and staff friendly! We enjoyed our stay despite the rainy weather.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Eugena4
Reviews.Content: We just got back from staying at this motel. It was clean and friendly staff! They do wonderful things with BACA charity as well! My friend had borrowed our GPS and had left it in their room at this motel and the staff called them and gave it back to them.. they are very honest!!!!!!!!!! The room were very very clean as well. We will be staying there again! Thank you for having us!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The Batson Family!

Reviews.Title: “Great family motel!”
Reviews.Author: fisher004
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Deer Run twice this summer, both times with small children. it is inexpensive, which is a plus for a quick weekend getaway. The entire staff is extremely friendly and willing to help in any way they can. The rooms are rather small, but are immaculate. The beds, while comfortable enough, are a tad bit worn and could stand to be replaced. The first room we stayed in had an old style, rather small television, while the new one had a nice sized flat screen. I assume they are slowly replacing all of the televisions. The swimming pool, while small, was clean and the kids loved it. Breakfast was just average, with frozen waffles (thawed and ready to toast), very good biscuits and gravy, bread to toast, a few types of cereal, and canned fruit. Very adequate for the money you pay to stay here. While more items (yogurt, fresh fruit) would be nice, it is probably not feasible to provide this and still keep costs down. As long as you realize this is a small, family owned motel, and not a Comfort Inn or Holiday Inn Express (along with their higher prices), you will not be disappointed. Nothing fancy, but definitely a great little place to stay. Next-door neighbor is Silver Dollar City, and it is also on Indian Point, so you have easy access to Table Rock Lake.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: jjburds
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located very close to silver dollar city which is very convenient and there is even a bus that will pick you up from motel parking lot and drop you off at the front gate. The rooms are old and dated. They are just basic and clean. Which was fine for us since we were rarely in our room. The parking situation can be difficult if motel is full. We came back late from seeing Branson belle and literally could not find a parking spot. The pool is disappointing it is small with greenish water and debris floating in it. Overall a great value if your like us and just need a place to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: Debbie6342
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Deer Run from July 27th to July 30th and this is my thoughts, I have literally stayed in Motels from Missouri to Honolulu Hawaii and this is the cleanest motel I have ever stayed in. On top of that what a wonderful breakfast every morning not just bagels and donuts, but hot biscuits and gravy, waffles, cereal, hot coffee, and juices. Oh yeah and the free shuttle to Silver Dollar City was quite awesome too saving money on parking and a lot less walking. I will absolutely stay here again. Deborah Ashworth 1075 Brush Creek Road Union, Mo. 63084

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: diediker9402
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this motel while visiting Silver Dollar City. I could not believe how close it was to SDC and the secluded feeling even on a main road. The rooms were super clean and comfortable. The breakfast was really good and there was even enough tables for the whole family to sit along with other families visiting there. The staff was extremely friendly. We plan on going back to stay there even if we do not visit SDC!!

Reviews.Title: “Back home again!!”
Reviews.Author: Jeanette W
Reviews.Content: Big D and I met friends in Branson for a weekend. While there, our friends chose to stay at the Hilton on the landing. We chose to forego the Hilton and stay at Deer Run because of our wonderful stay here previously. This stay we were greeted by Jodi's (owner) happy hello's and "welcome home!" We truly felt at home once again and even Indiana Jones greeted us (their beautiful miniature border collie). The rooms are very simple, clean, affordable and the beds are comfortable. Saturday morning we enjoyed the continental breakfast of OJ, hot coffee, biscuits and gravy, oatmeal, cereal and toast. While at breakfast Mark (owner) and Eber came into the room---greeted us with smiling faces, called me by nick name, hugged me, and greeted Dale with a handshake and said "big d and j-lo we are happy to see you again! Glad to have you home again!" This kind of of treatment is what we look for wherever we go and needless to say have never received at the Hilton! I guess Deer Runs ratings on Trip Advisor even proves that! Great hotel and even better hospitality!!! See you again soon family!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, needs better communication in the office.”
Reviews.Author: huzee
Reviews.Content: This is as close as you can stay to Silver Dollar City. The free shuttle is convenient. We were given the wrong shuttle times by the main office and missed out on time at the park.

Reviews.Title: “Great first family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Matt H
Reviews.Content: My wife and kids went on our first family vacation. We got to our hotel in branson that was close to deer run and was charging about 50 dollars more a night for a double queen room. We were highly upset by the small rooms and dirty old hotel. We checked out and managed to get a room at deer run. Deer run motel is a fantastic motel from the large clean rooms to the great quiet location and the very friendly staff. We had a wonderful vacation that started with our GREAT motel. Thanks to the staff at the deer run motel from the Hanson family. We will see you next year.

Reviews.Title: “Brink Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Gayle B
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the quietness of the rooms during the night. Our group was over 100 people and yet the rooms were quiet enough to get to sleep easily. The beds were very comfortable and each room I was in was well maintained. Jodi was a wonderful, hospitable office manager and went out of her way to accommodate our various needs.

Reviews.Title: “Best for your money!”
Reviews.Author: CharleyViper
Reviews.Content: This is our second trip to Branson this summer and the Deer Run Motel. The hotel is close to everything including just down the road to the lake. The owners are the greatest around and their staff is the friendliest. The rooms are extremely clean and comfortable. We had a room with a kitchenette which includes everything you need except for the food. If you're into Silver Dollar City, they have a bus that will pick you up free of charge so you don't have to fight the parking. The pool is clean and inviting and there are even bbqs next to the pool for your use along with a fire pit. There is no other place you can stay in Branson that is this clean for the money!

Reviews.Title: “Brink Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Sheila G
Reviews.Content: Great place to spend a reunion! The staff was very accomodating and friendly for our large family and we truly appeciated everything that you did to make our reunion memorable. The location of the motel makes it easy to get to all events. Our family really enjoyed the pool area also. I might suggest adding a pancake or waffle machine to your continental breakfast tho.

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly close to Silver Dollar City!”
Reviews.Author: Shannon P
Reviews.Content: I agree with the recent reviews - this motel is clean, friendly, and affordable. It is not luxurious in any stretch of the imagination, but if you are active vacationers and just need a place to crash and sleep, then this motel is more than fine. All that said, the most striking aspect of this property is that it is literally right next door to Silver Dollar City. If your plans include visiting SDC, you should strongly consider staying at this property. They have a free shuttle to the park (every couple of hours), but we were traveling with small children and wanted the flexibility of being able to leave when we wanted. When we left, we took the Indian Point exit from the parking lot. This exit "spits" you out literally right next to the entrance to the motel. From Tram Stop 2, it couldn't have been more than a 90 second drive! This was awesome when we had two hot, dirty, exhausted kids and wanted to get back to our room immediately! We stayed in a one-bedroom kitchenette and it looked just like the photo on the website, except the TV was updated. The room also had a small coffee table and two chairs at the front of the room. For a motel, the room was incredibly quiet - we didn't hear a peep from other rooms, except once when the kids in the room above us were stomping on the floor. Everything in the room was clean and in good shape. The shampoo - well, "hair and body wash" - is mounted in a dispenser in the back wall of the tub/shower. My son enjoyed the pool, which is on the small side and gets crowded after dinner. There's a convenience store within walking distance which we used to buy milk, snacks, sodas, etc. to keep in our kitchenette. Jodi in the Front Office was incredibly friendly and accommodating. She really made us feel welcome. Whenever our Branson plans include SDC, we will stay at the Deer Run Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, affordable, and convenient”
Reviews.Author: Hightekrednek
Reviews.Content: Easy to find, and quick and friendly check in. Owners are there all the time it seems, as they are a family owned motel. They even supply cell phone numbers of the husband(handyman) in case of an after hours emergency. Units were well maintained and comfortable. We had a kitchenette and basic cooking utensils were provided, however we had forgotten to bring salt and pepper. I went to the office and they graciously provided their own personal salt and pepper shakers until we could purchase our own at the nearby convenience store. Only negative comment that I have would be concerning the breakfast. Choices were cold cereal, a bowl of chunked mixed fruit, biscuits and gravy(no sausage), toaster waffles, and toast. I realize that for the money, you are not going to get a full hot breakfast, but a few changes to their menu would result in a better experience in my opinion, and not add too much expense. The biscuits were wonderful, so a little bit of sausage in the gravy would have been perfect. Also the purchase of a couple of commercial waffle makers, and some batter would be a cheap and easy way to upgrade the frozen waffles. Coffee seemed a little weak also. But overall, I would sum it up by repeating what I have as the title, as it was a clean, affordable, and convenient place to stay, and we enjoyed our time there as well. Check out the ziplines next door, Uncle Ike's trail rides, and Indian Point Marina as they are all nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Debbie M
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughters and I visited Branson for a week for a little R&R and we stayed at Deer Run Motel. It was the first time that we traveled by ourselves and we were a little nervous "being out on our own", but the staff at Deer Run Motel were amazing and the friendliest I have ever met.They truly made you feel like family. They were very accommodating and gave great tips to make our trip memorable. The rooms were exceptionally clean and the beds were amazingly comfortable. There were plenty of outside spaces set up all over the property to relax at and we felt very safe being there. It was a very enjoyable and peaceful place to spend our time. We will definitely be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Very Accomodating.”
Reviews.Author: oxjockey
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Deer Run Motel numerous times in the past 4 years. The staff has always been pleasant and accomodating. On our last visit in May of 2012, we were going to arrive late and with a boat. They had saved us parking space for our truck and boat. Had our room keys ready and we actually checked in the next morning. The staff has never been anything but great. Many little extras like a fire pit, bbq grills and picnic area make staying there extra fun for family get togethers etc and if you are tired of eating out. Rooms are always clean and quiet. Easily accessible to SDC and Indian Point attractions. Will continue to stay there while visiting the area.

Reviews.Title: “More than I could have asked for!”
Reviews.Author: cherryschock
Reviews.Content: My honey and I got married at the Silver Dollar City chapel this May and stayed at Deer Run for the weekend. They were not only our accommodations, but all of the guests and wedding party as well. Deer Run was also our reception venue. On a day that is usually chaos for women and their family, the owners of Deer Run not only made sure we had everything we needed, but assisted us in transforming the breakfast room in a romantic reception venue. It was incredible. I told them what I had in mind, and they made it happen! I also had a little mishap of forgetting my wedding shoes at the motel... one of the owners came to my and brought them to me. All I have to say is that this place is INCREDIBLE and the people who run it are so far beyond AMAZING! I am sure many many anniversaries will be spent here along with our family trips to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “what a positive experience”
Reviews.Author: BigD51
Reviews.Content: We went to stay one night and attend Silver Dollar City the next day. We were celebrating birthdays that week. Upon arrival saw our names on the marquee. The family run business could not have been more pleasant. they took our picture, gave us a clean and comfortable room with complimentary sparkling grape drink with little glasses. Now when you add in the convience and the low price how could we not stay another night. So we did. When the owner realized that the maid missed our room, because we were suppose to check out that day--they immediately brought towels and offered to clean it. All we needed were the towels. What a treat to see service with a smile. I am scheduled back June 6 to go to convention in town. I will drive past approximately 50 motels to get to this one and stay the night before drive back past the 50 motels to theLanding, but it will be worth it to visit this very family run motel.

Reviews.Title: “Arrive as a guest, leave as family!”
Reviews.Author: Amanda K
Reviews.Content: As the marqee states, arrive as a guest, leave as family! This statement is very true to it's word. I stayed for a weekend while attending a wedding. The reception was held in the beautiful banquet room that they have. The staff was very curtious and helpful with everything. The rooms were very neat and clean. There were a few little things that weren't packed and after asking where to get them at the desk they handed them to us on the spot!!! Great place to stay, will definitely be returning with the family!!!

Reviews.Title: “Spur of the moment trip!”
Reviews.Author: Gonzo822
Reviews.Content: My friend and I had an urge to get out of town for a couple days so we jumped on the bike and went to Branson! Deer Run is the perfect location and very convenient, with a bar/grill, convenience store, zip lines and Silver Dollar City right next door! It's a nice ride to the strip and Table Rock Lake. Deer Run is easy to find, very clean, has an awesome breakfast with real breakfast food (complimentary), and owners are extremely friendly! The staff is more than helpful, they treat you like family! They even helped to plan some of our activities with some Deer Run discounts! This biker friendly location even let us use their cage (car) when the honey needed a break from the bike! I highly recommend Deer Run Motel to everyone, and I have a new place for a regular get away!

Reviews.Title: “Best place in town”
Reviews.Author: Ronnie S
Reviews.Content: No complaints, very fresh and different then chain hotels, had the best sleep ever had at any hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Silver Dollar City shuttle from Deer Run”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn540
Reviews.Content: This is such a convenient place to stay when going to Silver Dollar City. We loved just getting on the bus and being taken to the gate. The pick up times were convenient and the drivers were prompt. The shuttle service is free too! Deer Run was a very nice place to stay - very clean and the hosts were exceptionally nice. There was a terrific restaurant within walking distance: Just 1 More, Bar and Grill. Not a fancy place, but outstanding hamburgers!!! The pizza looked great but we didn't have a chance to order one.

Reviews.Title: “Owners are EXCEPTIONAL! Clean motel - not fancy but perfect.”
Reviews.Author: Jeanette W
Reviews.Content: I chose this location due to the reviews on trip advisor. I wanted to suprise my fella with a quiet but perfect place to stay, something simple but homey our birthday weekend getaway. The choice was perfect!! We arrived to see our nicknames on Deer Runs marquee!! That was our first surprise! We arrived in the office to a fabulous down home greeting--smiles--caring--kindness--and exceptional service. We received an actual key to the room not a card. Our second surprise was a chilled bottle of sparkling grape juice, 2 champagne glasses and a birthday card!! This is fantastic guest relations--ones that the larger chain motel, hotels and resorts should follow. Amazing such great things come in small packages!! Yes, the rooms are very plain and simple but very very clean and a most comfortable bed. The air and heat worked great. The motel has free shuttle service to SDC but is also within walking distance. We had planned to stay one night but things were just to perfect so we stayed another night and have already booked a room for a June stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Very good motel!”
Reviews.Author: Columbiafamily
Reviews.Content: We just left this motel and we are pleased with our stay! Keep in mind that this is a MOTEL so it not supposed to be "fancy"! But is very clean, excelent location, good breakfast, great costumer service! The room we stayed is very spacious, clean beddings, confortable. No complains at all! As I said if you are looking for staying in a fancy hotel this is not the one. But if you want a very convenient, clean, basic and GREAT price motel at Silver Dollar City, Deer Run is the place to be. Detail: we are a couple with a 7-y-old daughter and she loves to drink milk before bedtime. I asked the manager, at 9:00pm, where I could get milk for my daughter and they got out of their way and brought the milk to our room free. This is what I call a good example of costumer service.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay when visiting Silver Dollar City”
Reviews.Author: todolist
Reviews.Content: Jody & Heber (pronounced silent H) are genuinely interested in our stay! How fresh is that!? We have enjoyed everything about our stay so far. We lost our favorite spot when it changed hands, dropped quality and raised prices. When we decided to spend most of our summer's Branson time at Silver Dollar City we decided to check this site for places close by. This is CLOSE!! The rates are very reasonable, especially after an added discount because of our SDC season passes. We are so pleased! We'll be here several times this year. Come see us, ya hear!

Reviews.Title: “No traffic!”
Reviews.Author: maccogirl
Reviews.Content: This is THE place to stay if you are visiting Silver Dollar City. There is no traffic to fight. You can be in your hotel room in two or three minutes after getting to your car at SDC. It is clean, large rooms, breakfast provided, pool, convenience store adjacent (also with a small bar). I wouldn't stay here if you are going to shows in Branson (too far out), but I will never stay anywhere else when going to SDC.

Reviews.Title: “The place to stay when in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: edmenendez
Reviews.Content: We stayed there 4 nights. This is a family owned and operated motel. The breakfast was great! Free and homemade. Just what you need on vacation. We stayed here because our regular place was sold out on 2 of the nights we were in Branson. THIS is our new regular place now. We love everything about it. Location, people, service, rooms. We will definitely stay here again next time we're in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience for us”
Reviews.Author: Jerry B
Reviews.Content: Loved it after a long day at Silver Dollar City. Very clean and close to the park. Will definately stay there in the summer!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay! Would highly recommend.”
Reviews.Author: Frank M
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay here. Rooms were exceptionally clean, staff was friendly, welcoming, and very helpful. Great location right next to Silver Dollar City was very convenient and easy to find.

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely be back!”
Reviews.Author: RunDMC85
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at Deer Run. The staff was so friendly and helpful and our room was very clean and great for the price. We got 2 days for the price of 1 at Silver Dollar City (which is right next door) for staying at the motel. To make it even more convenient, they have a shuttle to take you to and from the motel. They offer breakfast in their clean and spacious breakfast room which we made it to every morning. We will definitely be back and will be recommending them to all of our friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “We will stay here again!!”
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights at Deer Run. The owners are the friendliest people that you will ever meet. The room was clean. The property was easy to find and is very accessible to Silver Dollar City, as well as only being a few minutes from the Branson strip. Very quiet location. They offer a continental breakfast that was fast and simple. Good biscuits and gravy!! We will definitely stay there again and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “We keep going back”
Reviews.Author: BradleyEudora
Reviews.Content: We spent 13 days in Oct. at Deer Run. It was so close to Silver Dollar City for us The beds are so nice and housekeeping kept our rooms clean and ready for us. We visited with friends in the breakfast room and enjoyed the new biscuits and gravy meal. Everyone is so friendly and we all feel like family. .

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Silver Dollar City, good prices.”
Reviews.Author: JeramieOK
Reviews.Content: Branson is covered in hotels. We go pretty regular because we only live about 2.5 hrs out. Ive stayed in pretty much every major motel in Branson. We started staying at Deer Run Recently. It is an older hotel, not fancy, but the location is good if you dont want to stay in town. Its FAR easier to get to Silver Dollar City from there than anywhere else. You come in the opposite direction of all other traffic. You can literally walk to Silver dollar if you dont mind hiking about a mile. That however shouldnt be a problem as Silver Dollar is pretty much all walkiang on hills. This is our go to these days. Good value, clean enough, not fancy but good overall.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and convenient”
Reviews.Author: David55197
Reviews.Content: Good value for the reasonable rates. The rooms are simple but very clean and well-maintained. On several visits, I've never noticed intrusive noise from other rooms. The motel is a couple of minutes from Silver Dollar City. You can't walk there safely, but the hotel's free shuttle delivers you right to the park entrance. There's a little bar/restaurant and small grocery store right next door to the hotel, just a short walk up the driveway.

Reviews.Title: “Great little place”
Reviews.Author: kim w
Reviews.Content: Visited Branson in August. This place was just great. only seconds from Silver Dolar City & a short drive into downtown Branson. Clean & very friendly staff. Quiet place and just minutes to Table Rock Lake & Moonshine Beach. Already preparing to make reservations for next summer.

Reviews.Title: “Great place & Great location for S.D.C. trip”
Reviews.Author: trikeman007
Reviews.Content: We were in Branson for a S.D.C. weekend, and the Deer Run motel, with it's free shuttle to S.D.C. was a perfect place to stay. It was away from all the noise of downtown and sat out in the quiet of the woods. Our room was clean and looked as the one in the motel pictures on their web page. Staff were nice & friendly. We would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Kyle E
Reviews.Content: We recently had the pleasure of staying at the Deer Run Motel in Branson during a weekend trip to Silver Dollar City. This is our second year to stay with the fine people at the Deer Run, and we have thoroughly enjoyed both experiences. The rooms are extremely clean and well maintained, and the staff could be the friendliest in Branson. We love the family atmosphere there, and our kids especially enjoy the pool. The motel is only about a driver-seven iron from the parking lot to SDC, and with the convenient shuttle pick-ups and drop-offs, we were enjoying ourselves in the park within minutes. It's also only minutes from Table Rock Lake in the other direction. Their breakfast is not exactly a gourmet spread, but they keep the food well stocked, and the breakfast room provides a great chance to mingle and interact with the other guests. We plan on making yearly visits to Branson and SDC, and when we do we will always stay at the Deer Run and we highly recommend it for other families. Kyle & Janice Bryant, Arkansas

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Close to Silver Dollar City!”
Reviews.Author: aer2001
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough good things about this motel! We stayed here for one night while in Branson visiting Silver Dollar City, and will definitely stay here again!! The location is fantastic (they don't lie when they say they're the closest hotel to Silvery Dollar City!), the staff was very friendly, and the room was clean. The beds were very comfortable, and we were all able to fall asleep fast, and stay asleep all night. We will definitely stay here again, and recommend it to anyone we know looking for a hotel close to Silver Dollar City!

Reviews.Title: “We always go back. Love it and the owners.”
Reviews.Author: BradleyEudora
Reviews.Content: We go to Silver Dollar City a lot and Deer Run is close by. We like the price of our room and it is always clean and we sleep so good. They have updated the breakfast room and now have biscuits and gravy and no canned peaches, which is a joke among those of us that stay there for three weeks in October. We will be back this October if we can book a room.

Reviews.Title: “What a blast! Owners were wonderful with everything! Even sat and visited with us and told us what to see.”
Reviews.Author: zmanndee
Reviews.Content: Definitly will go back. There were 3 couples on motorcycles to see the scenery. Hospitality was great for all. Booked 2 nights and decided once we got there to stay one more. Every thing we needed was in walking distance. Silver Dollar City was right down the road and they even have a shuttle. Thenk you for a memorable vacation, can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “Come a guests leave as family”
Reviews.Author: Wohlerworld
Reviews.Content: When I was checking out I was told this was the hotel motto, "Come as guests, leave as family." We have been visiting Branson for at least 14 years now and we have stayed at Deer Run at least once during every one of those years. This is the first time we have visited under the new management. We spent a day at the pool and during that time Mark and Eberet (I think that was his name. I know for sure his nick name was "Thor") the owners came to the pool on several occasions during the day to see how thing were going. This is my first visit where I have ever met the owners outside of the office. We were at the pool about eight hour or so that day and Mark and Thor remembered my kids names (all four of them) each time they came back by the pool and they also stopped to talk and briefly play with the kids. We found a tree frog at night and my son lead Thor over to the place where it was and they caught it and my son showed it to every one he saw. This was a first for me. They did not have to spend their time checking on the guests to see how they were doing. It seems like these owners really care about their guests. I and my family look forward to visiting them again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice for family visiting to Silver Dollar City!”
Reviews.Author: Shari402
Reviews.Content: Deer Run Motel was an excellent value for our family vacation! We were traveling with our son and his wife and children. Having the option of a suite with a kitchenette so close to Silver Dollar City was great. Having free shuttle service to SDC was also a bonus. Other areas of Branson were also easily accessible. Thank you for the wonderful accommodations!!

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, great staff, great prices.”
Reviews.Author: jprohaska
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay. The staff is helpful and friendly, we felt at home. Nicely priced clean rooms in a great location. Going back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Never Disappoints!”
Reviews.Author: cherryschock
Reviews.Content: Once again the hotel stay was awesome. The breakfast room has been updated and looks great, and it was nice to wake up to some hot, yummy biscuits and gravy. The staff was super courteous and helpful and treated us like family. Deer Run will always be our home away from home in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly Average”
Reviews.Author: kenjigal
Reviews.Content: My point of view: Have stayed at very few "cheaper" motels. Quick overnight visit to go ziplining. Pros: Beds were comfortable enough to fall asleep and stay asleep Clean Very friendly front desk, the wife and owner are very present on the property Location – right across from Silver Dollar City Cons: There was a huge bug on our door chain, but we didn’t find any others There was an envelope to tip the maid (shouldn’t the hotel be paying the maids’ salary?) There are no toiletries other than bar soap The drapes on the windows don't close completely unless you push a chair up against them Overall, this hotel was nothing special but also nothing to complain about. The breakfast was pretty blah with just a couple cereal selections, biscuits & gravy, and ego waffles. We paid $65 for a Saturday night and I didn't feel we got an expectional value nor do I think we paid too much.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, Great location, Decent little motel.”
Reviews.Author: KCStrip
Reviews.Content: The wife & kids and I stayed here for 4 nights and were quite pleased overall. It is pretty inexpensive, so don't expect a fancy place. But our rooms were clean, the A/C worked great (and that's saying something because it was triple digit heat outside), the pool was nice, and open late until 10pm, and the staff we dealt with were very nice. Another bonus is that the property is dang near on Silver Dollar City property. It is adjacent to it, in fact. When I booked the rooms, I was a little leery that SDC traffic might make it a problem to get to and from the hotel, especially in July, which I assume is a peak season. However, traffic was no problem at all. And if you are going to SDC, they have a shuttle that runs back and forth a few times each day. It's about a 3 minute trip (seriously) and you get dropped off right at the front gate. There is a small grocery store, and ice cream store, and bar & grill right next door, which is very convenient. The continental breakfast is not much, but for the price, the overall value of the motel is very good.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location but disappointing experience”
Reviews.Author: edpaytontulsa
Reviews.Content: The motel is extremely convenient for anyone wanting to spend time at Silver Dollar City and the shuttle makes that even easier. However, the breakfast leaves a great deal to be desired. In fact we went out to eat on our second day because of it. The most frustrating part of our stay was that the pool was closed on Saturday. We had planned to be at SDC until it was too hot in the afternoon, then spend the rest of the afternoon at the pool. We got back in time to find that the pool had been half drained on a Saturday! No explanation. No offer of partial refund. Just no pool to swim in. Don't know the reason why, but no effort made to accommodate. The room was clean. The mattresses are very firm (if you like firm mattresses you will be pleased).

Reviews.Title: “We highly recommend Deer Run!”
Reviews.Author: TheCoops99
Reviews.Content: We just recently returned from a 3 night stay at Deer Run, and we loved it! Everything was wonderful, from the staff to the breakfast to the pool. Our main destination this trip was Silver Dollar City, so Deer Run was the perfect choice for us. The shuttle that picks you up and takes you to the gate at SDC, and then picks you up and takes you back basically to your door at Deer Run, is alone worth the price of the room! The staff was friendly and helpful, the breakfast was plentiful (waffles, cereal, biscuits and gravy, milk, juice, etc), the pool was clean, the room was spotless, and the kitchenette saved us a ton of money! Cute story--we returned to our room from a day at SDC, and we discovered that the housekeeper had tucked our daughter's baby doll in for a nap when she made the bed. My little girl was so tickled to see this! Another great thing--when we checked into our room, we were so happy to discover that the air conditioner had already been turned on for us, and the room was cool and comfortable; very important since the temp in Branson was in the triple digits! The room rate was VERY reasonable, especially for summer! You also get a discount on the room if you are a SDC season pass holder, making it an even better value. We visit SDC often, and we will never stay anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel at a great price”
Reviews.Author: diane_schrock
Reviews.Content: This motel is very clean and quiet. We go to Branson every summer and we always stay at Deer Run Motel. We always enjoy our stay and sleep great. The free breakfast is very convenient and there is quite a varied choice of food and drink. All in all the motel is a wonderful place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay close to Silver Dollar City”
Reviews.Author: lcray12564
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights. Clean, friendly, and very affordable. Will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to staying there again”
Reviews.Author: Justsayin1969
Reviews.Content: Wonderful place to stay. The price was right and the owners and staff were all genuine and friendly. You will feel more than welcomed and enjoy your stay. It is very well kept up and clean. I highly recommend staying here and I can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for family friendly...you will love this place.”
Reviews.Author: Lala86_11
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at Deer Run but it will not be our last. Nice, large, extremely clean room. Great hot breakfast too. We loved being able to catch the FREE shuttle to Silver Dollar City. What a service! The best part of our stay was the hospitality of the staff and even the owners of Deer Run. It isn't very often that the owner of a motel will sit down and have their morning cup of coffee with you and your family. The swimming pool was wonderful and very clean. Can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this place and will definitely come back!”
Reviews.Author: Idalynne
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Deer Run Motel for 4 days over the 4th of July holiday. It was a great place, comforatable roons, extremely friendly people at the front desk and all employees were very friendly and did a wonderful job. The rooms were clean and neat and they even have an outside swimming pool. This is a very comfortable place to stay. there is a small restuarant and bar right up the hill, and a small store and ice cream shop. You can walk to them and also to Silver Dollar city or take the shuttle, which comes several times a day. We had a small wedding in the conference room downstairs. Everything turned out wonderful. I would recommend this place for any event you might have, family reunion, birrthday party, etc. they even have tables outside under the walkways to sit and relax at. I love the location. It is not on the main strip around all the crowd, but it only takes about 15 minutes or so to hit 76 where most of the shows and attractions are. I would recommend this place to everyone who is going to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Greatest place to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: arlenejan
Reviews.Content: Come as a guest, Leave as family is their motto. And thats exactly how you feel when you leave there.the rooms are clean, the staff is pleasant, and the owne rs are amazing. I had my wedding there and thanks to all the wonderful people at Deer Run, I had the perfect weddimg! I highly recommend you give this place a try, It will be my only place in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: ieesha6202
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here and really enjoyed this hotel. The front office staff were amazing, the room was very clean and affordable too. Can't wait to stay at Deer Run again.

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: andygLafayette_IN
Reviews.Content: We had our family reunion with 77 people from 7 different states. The hotel was not new, but was clean. There were different rooms available for us from 2 bedrooms with full size refrigs to 1 bedroom w/ kitchennette to regular rooms. The staff was friendly (actually smiled!) and went above and beyond to accomodate us. (i.e. one party had car trouble and wasn't going to make it- they cancelled reservations last minute and didn't charge them!) It is located across from the entrance to Silver Dollar City and there is free shuttle service. This was handy for the families with kids that wanted something to do. The large conference room was free and well air conditioned. We had reserved it for Friday evening and all day Sat. after the free continental breakfast. The pool was clean and well kept. I would definetly recommend it and plan on staying there again for another reunion!

Reviews.Title: “We always stay at Deer Run”
Reviews.Author: Happytraveler51697
Reviews.Content: We are a family of four and have stayed at Deer Run every time we have visited Silver Dollar City since we discovered it. We've stayed there probably ten times in all. It is always clean, comfortable, and the owners and employees are always a joy. We especially enjoyed meeting the new mascot on our recent visit--Indiana Jones, a beautiful and friendly shetland sheepdog :) Great family atmosphere and right next door to Silver Dollar City. The shuttle service to the park make sthis place perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: “In 10 years of coming to Branson and twice that many hotels at least, this is the BEST stay we've ever had!”
Reviews.Author: Jolita88
Reviews.Content: Looking for a great stay in Branson? This is beyond a great place! Our Room has 2 queen beds, stove, fridge, microwave, SUPER CLEAN inside and out, away from Branson traffic, free shuttle to SDC. Bikers welcome. Owners do all to make you feel like family!Can't say enough to convey how awesome This place is! Thank you Mark and Heber from a wonderful vacation!

Reviews.Title: “WOW!! NEW OWNERS...HUGE IMPROVEMENTS!”
Reviews.Author: happytraveler9432
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Deer Run several times and am happy to report that not only does the motel have new owners but those owners brought great improvements. The rooms are spotless, the breakfast facility is newly remodeled and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The beds are comfortable and the environment is perfect for any family. The location is perfect for Silver Dollar City goers as the motel is just down the street and they offer the only free shuttle from the motel to Silver Dollar City. If you don't have tickets to Silver Dollar City, no worries Deer Run offers tickets at their front desk. I will continue to stay at Deer Run and will suggest it to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Second to None”
Reviews.Author: Crankin01
Reviews.Content: Deer Run is the best choice if staying in Branson. It's close to Silver Dollar City, out of the way from all the traffic, awesome price for what you get, and wonderful people. This is a great place to stay for a day, but I could easily stay for a month. Silver Dollar City is just a stones throw, so you could walk or take the convenient bus that stops by pretty frequently, so you don't have to worry about parking at SDC. Their suites have a complete kitchenette that is very convenient. I would definitely recommend this motel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “The cleanest, most friendly place to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: 333justme333
Reviews.Content: The staff was overly courteous and very accommadating. They make you feel right at home as soon as you check in. The rooms were spotless as well as the conference and meeting rooms. Very reasonable prices. It's the closest hotel to Silver Dollar City ( which is awesome) ! It's right across the street and they have a shuttle. Best place I've stayed so far and looking forward to staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Phenomenal stay”
Reviews.Author: cherryschock
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean. Parking was great. The location makes navigating through busy traffic a breeze. The thing that wow-ed me the most are the owner/operators. These people made sure my stay was comfortable, and a five star hotel isn't as attentive to customers as these folks are. I will be back time and time again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: britney311fan
Reviews.Content: Very clean, great service, great location, especially when visiting Silver Dollar City! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: bigasufan
Reviews.Content: Having to travel only 2 hours to Branson, we have stayed in many of the hotels. We have stayed at Deer Run at least 20 times, and it is far and away our favorite. The beds are without a doubt the most comfortable in Branson, bar none. It is convenient to Silver Dollar City, yet is just a short drive to the Hwy 76 strip with all the shows. The continental breakfast is more than adequate. The atmosphere is worth a lot, very rustic and down home.

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal and Location”
Reviews.Author: JSM1625
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great deal and the best location to Silver Dollar City. The free shuttle was a nice service. Also, the location allowed us to avoid Branson traffic. We only ventured into the city once, and the front desk staff told us the best route to avoid traffic. Big Help! The rooms are clean and staff was always friendly. The only con was the breakfast. We ended up finding a Walmart and bought some breakfast for our 2nd morning. Otherwise, it was a great stay, and we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price and location for Silver Dollar City!”
Reviews.Author: Fravel
Reviews.Content: This motel is older, yet it is very clean and kept. The location is prime if you are going to Silver Dollar City and it is a great value and still close enough to Branson attractions. They also have a shuttle service to SDC included.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful”
Reviews.Author: barkerpolly
Reviews.Content: My family and I (there were 7 of us, 5 kids 2 adults) stayed at deer run this summer. We had a wonderful time. We were close to Silver Dollar City and didn't have to fight the traffic. There is also a walmart and several fast food places in Old Branson which is near by and you don't have to fight the traffic to get there. Deer run is not fancy by any means, but we just used the rooms to sleep. It was family oriented and quiet. The pool was nice for the little ones to swim in and they had a blast. The staff was very friendly. I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends. We are going back this month and I am staying on the strip, the only reason is because my husband wants to experience the strip this time around without the kids. if you are looking for a quiet place to stay this would be the place.

Reviews.Title: “It's a wonderful place 2 stay,especially if ur going 2 Silver Dollar City!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kearrakyle
Reviews.Content: We LOVE this motel. We stay here every time we go to Silver Dollar City. We luv that they have the shuttle, it helps when the kids get cranky & needs a lil nap!! There also helpful 2 ur needs. My dads handicap & they made sure our stay was convenant for us. There very friendly & nice. I've reccomended this place 2 alot of people, they luv it 2!! We want 2 thank u for making our stay wonderful. Ur 1 of the reasons we luv SDC & Branson. Thats why we visit every 2 years. So, thank you for making us 2 want 2 keep coming back!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: MSALMOULA
Reviews.Content: We stayed over the July 4th weekend and v impressed with the quality of this motel. It may look a little shabby from outside (to some folks) but is excellent from inside !!! Rooms, space, linen/towels were great. We asked for extra amenities - fridge/micro (coz of toddler needs) and they were happy to provide it for minimal cost. The folks are so friendly and quick with their service. The breakfast is decent but you really can't expect much more for the price. V easy access to SDC but its a 15-20 min drive to downtown. Will definitely stay again !!!

Reviews.Title: “Spring family vacation”
Reviews.Author: blakewhite23
Reviews.Content: Me, my wife, and two girls came to Branson with my brother and his little girl in March. we looked at several different motels and chose to stay at Deer Run. the price was good at about $50 a night. One of the reasons we decided to stay at this motel was the continental breakfast because of our bigger family and the free shuttle to Silver Dollar City. The breakfast is average with donuts, cereal, waffles, milk, juice, etc. The shuttle though was a little bit deceiving. The shuttle was a SDC shuttle and only ran every hour and a half, starting at 9:15 in the morning. We missed the first shuttle and just decided to drive and park. The staff was very friendly and service great. The rooms were average and clean. The only bad part about the motel if you want to call it bad was the location. The good part was that it is actually walking distance to SDC but whatever else you choose to do you have to drive all the way back into town. But like I said if you want to call that bad then Deer Run is a good motel for those vacationers on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place to Stay While in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: buster501
Reviews.Content: This is our second time to stay at Deer Run, and had a good time. Motel is great for our big family. Rooms are clean and comfortable and are large in size. Motel staff is friendley and helpful. It is closest thing you can get to Silver Dollar City. We love to go back to the motel after a long day at the park and sit on the deck and listen to the quite,while the kids swim in the pool. We have stayed in motels in town and Deer Run beats them all hands down. Allready looking forward to our next stay with them.

Reviews.Title: “Totally awesome, as usual!”
Reviews.Author: Mimito6
Reviews.Content: We love, love, love Deer Run Motel....We've been coming to Branson for years, mostly to visit Silver Dollar City and this motel is perfect for that....The rooms are huge, they are clean, the staff are wonderful every time you see them...They go over and above to help you out...The free shuttle is great....no long lines in traffic or hiking for miles from the back parking lots, they drop you off right at the door.....the pool is great....and the absolute best thing about Deer Run is how quiet and peaceful it gets at night.....No traffic noise, no bright lights, just peaceful with a beautiful view from the back of the property and comfy rocking chairs to sit in and enjoy it from....We have probably stayed at this motel at least 30 times and we've never had a bad experience....One time during an after Christmas stay the rest of my family left early one morning to head home...my children and I weren't in a hurry and decided to hang around....Got ready to leave and broke the car key off in the trunk and it was the only key I had....long story short, they let us stay in the room at no charge, recommended an awesome pizza place that delivered, and even had their maintenance man drive me into the local Wal Mart to see if we could duplicate the key (we couldn't due to too much was broken off)....My dad ended up bringing me another car key and 8 hours later we were on the road home......and though we ended up leaving much later than the check out time, there was no charge to me at all.... When we visit the Deer Run, it's like visiting an old family friend.....While it isn't a Marriott or Hilton, it is a very clean, decent place to stay and we take the money we aren't spending on a motel room and spend it elsewhere.... Don't be afraid to stay here, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Chaosia
Reviews.Content: Clean rooms, great view. Their breakfast is one of the best I've seen: oatmeal, waffles, donuts, cereal, toast, coffee, tea, juice. Shuttle to Silver Dollar City. Local pizza places will deliver. Did I mention the rooms are CLEAN? Oh, and lots of hot water for those looong hot showers. Good about accommodating my daughter's need for a groundfloor room due to medical equipment.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Silver Dollar City”
Reviews.Author: ring_of_blue
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here several times, and will again. In fact, this is the only place we stay when we go to Silver Dollar City. It's the closest hotel to the park. The staff are very service-oriented, and the rooms are clean. Not fancy, just average. This works for us as we don't spend a lot of time in our rooms, anyway. The free breakfast is just OK with frozen waffles, donuts, juice, coffee, cereal, and some fruit.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: lessa37
Reviews.Content: Very nice motel to stay in if you are going to Silver Dollar City. Room was nice and clean. Pillows could have been a little fluffier. Check in clerk, Travis , was very helpful. Take his recommendations on restuarants. Tried Starvin Marvins, which Travis did not recommend, and it was not good at all. Breakfest was about what was expected. Cerals, toast, little doughnuts and waffles. Coffee and juice of course. Shuttle to Silver Dollar City was nice

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and clean”
Reviews.Author: TinyRabbit
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson for a short vacation and we are so glad we found Deer Run. It's very close to Silver Dollar City and since that was our main objective it was the perfect choice. They have a bus to and from SDC throughout the day and that was a selling point right there. We never had to deal with the traffic and parking. Just hop on a bus and get off at the gates. It's very close to SDC though so if you wanted to walk I think that is doable. Our 14 year old son enjoyed the pool. They have a game room with a pool table and some video games which we took advantage of as well. The breakfast wasn't anything special but had waffles, cereal, donuts etc. Not bad for free :) There is a snack machine so bring change if you think that will be something you want to use. Our room was clean and served it's purpose just great. We did have the kitchenette and it wasn't that great. We really wanted the room for the fridge and it didn't really feel cold enough to store the stuff we had brought so we just used our cooler. No big loss but be forewarned of that. The people were friendly and very helpful. We enjoyed our stay and have suggested it to family headed to SDC. We would stay again but maybe not pay extra to get the kitchenette. Deer Run is nothing fancy but if you want a home base for your Branson adventure this is the motel you want.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: pixiestix1964
Reviews.Content: Our family visited Brandson and was told by word of mouth that the deer run was a great place to stay so we checked them out. Nice and clean, pool was awesome, friendly people who ran the place. Loved the sound of the tree frogs at night. Walking distance to silver dollar city.. over all a great place for families to go to.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean, Friendly, Affordable”
Reviews.Author: maggielovestotravel
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at The Deer Run but not our last. We have found a new family favorite. Yes, it is a little out of the way but you don't have to fight bumper to bumper traffic getting to or leaving Silver Dollar City. The staff was very friendly and check in was fast and easy. The breakfast leaves a little to be desired, mostly cereal and doughnuts. There were several cars in the parking lot so I assume several rooms were booked. We had a nice quiet stay. Comfortable beds too! It is worth checking this money saver out.

Reviews.Title: “Just ok, nothing more”
Reviews.Author: KbHb
Reviews.Content: The Deer Run was just ok and that was it, nothing more. If you are going to spend all your time at Silver Dollar City then thats fine. This hotel is so far out of the way from town. The Room was very clean except for something on the shower liner. Our room stayed veryt stuffy and hot while we were trying to sleep, my Mother In Law in the next room said the same about here room. We checked in on a Friday night and was put on the 3rd floor, we asked for a lower level and the very young looking boy said they were all full on the 1st and 2nd floors. The parking lot never looked full nore did all the rooms. The young boy couldnt even give us the right directions to our room. He had us looking on the wrong side and even the wrong end. One more thing that I didn't like was you had to worry about keeping up with two big keys on a big plastic key chain. No key cards.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE”
Reviews.Author: Travel2Arkansas
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here three times and love it. The regular rooms, and the family rooms are nice and clean. The pool looks nice, but never swam. Give it a try..........close to Silver Dollar City. Fast check in, and out.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!”
Reviews.Author: mmkjmg
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at Deer Run. Another great time! The room was clean, the beds were comfortable, the entire property becomes quiet at bedtime. Just an all around great time.

HotelInfo.Name: Deer Run Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 982 Indian Ploint Rd, 982 Indian Point Rd, Branson, MO 65616
